title: Is our past our fate? - Quora

response.answer_text: That’s a really cool question. If you’re unfamiliar with determinism, I recommend you read into it. It’s some really interesting stuff. I think that who we are as people is shaped by our experiences (our past). And who we are as people determines how we act in the present. So I suppose our past is our fate, because our future is determined by how we act.

Fate refers to an explanation for our current experiences in life. There are usually three explanations for this: 1 It was so determined/written by God right at the beginning of time. It is known as kismet , taqdeer , talai-ezhuttu, que-sera-sera, etc. in other languages. 2 It is the result of what we did in the past: As you sow, so you rep. 3. It is the consequence of what we did in a previous incarnation/birth/janma. Pick whatever seems convincing to you. What matters, however, is how you behave now, no matter what landed you here. Peace! 16 Oct 2020
